picked.title: After Poland had a great meeting with Chancellor Merkel and then with PM Shinzō Abe of Japan & President Moon of South Korea.

articles.title: After Poland had a great meeting with Chancellor Merkel and then with PM Shinzō Abe of Japan & President Moon of South Korea.
Leaving Hamburg for Washington, D.C. and the WH. Just left China’s President Xi where we had an excellent meeting on trade & North Korea.
I strongly pressed President Putin twice about Russian meddling in our election. He vehemently denied it. I've already given my opinion.....
Sanctions were not discussed at my meeting with President Putin. Nothing will be done until the Ukrainian & Syrian problems are solved!
The fact that President Putin and I discussed a Cyber Security unit doesn't mean I think it can happen. It can't-but a ceasefire can,& did!
When I left Conference Room for short meetings with Japan and other countries, I asked Ivanka to hold seat. Very standard. Angela M agrees!
Getting rdy to leave for France @ the invitation of President Macron to celebrate & honor Bastille Day and 100yrs since U.S. entry into WWI.
Great bilateral meetings at Élysée Palace w/ President @EmmanuelMacron. The friendship between our two nations and ourselves is unbreakable.
Great evening with President @EmmanuelMacron & Mrs. Macron. Went to Eiffel Tower for dinner. Relationship with France stronger than ever.
Great conversations with President @EmmanuelMacron and his representatives on trade, military and security.
Just landed from Paris, France. It was an incredible visit with President @EmmanuelMacron. A lot discussed and accomplished in two days!

data.msg: He had meetings with Russian President Putin, Germany Chancellor Merkel, Japan PM Abe, French President Macron, Chinese President Xi, and South Korean President Moon. It's worth notice that he discussed election meddling with Putin.

picked.title: After all of these years of suffering thru ObamaCare, Republican Senators must come through as they have promised!

articles.title: For years, even as a civilian," I listened as Republicans pushed the Repeal and Replace of ObamaCare. Now they finally have their chance!"
After all of these years of suffering thru ObamaCare, Republican Senators must come through as they have promised!
Next week the Senate is going to vote on legislation to save Americans from the ObamaCare DISASTER. #WeeklyAddress
The Republican Senators must step up to the plate and, after 7 years, vote to Repeal and Replace. Next, Tax Reform and Infrastructure. WIN!
If Republicans don't Repeal and Replace the disastrous ObamaCare, the repercussions will be far greater than any of them understand!
Republicans have a last chance to do the right thing on Repeal & Replace after years of talking & campaigning on it.
Big day for HealthCare. After 7 years of talking, we will soon see whether or not Republicans are willing to step up to the plate!
ObamaCare is torturing the American People.The Democrats have fooled the people long enough. Repeal or Repeal & Replace! I have pen in hand.
The American people have waited long enough. There has been enough talk and no action for seven years. Now is the time for action!
After seven years of talking" Repeal & Replace, the people of our great country are still being forced to live with imploding ObamaCare!"
Unless the Republican Senators are total quitters, Repeal & Replace is not dead! Demand another vote before voting on any other bill!
If ObamaCare is hurting people, & it is, why shouldn't it hurt the insurance companies & why should Congress not be paying what public pays?

data.header: "After seven years of talking", he expects to replace Obamacare
data.msg: He highlighted that he has been waiting to see Obamacare replaced for "seven years". This must brought a lot of pressure to Republicans vote on repealing Obamacare.
data.image-copyright: Gage Skidmore from Peoria, AZ, United States of America

picked.title: Honored to serve as Commander-in-Chief to the courageous men and women of our U.S. Armed Forces. A grateful nation thanks you!

articles.title: #HappyIndependenceDay #USA
Congratulations to the dedicated professionals of the USSS as they celebrate their 152nd anniversary. Thank you!  …
Honored to serve as Commander-in-Chief to the courageous men and women of our U.S. Armed Forces. A grateful nation thanks you!
The #USSJohnFinn will provide essential capabilities to keep America safe. Our sailors are the best anywhere in the world. Congratulations!
Today, it was my privilege to welcome survivors of the #USSArizona to the @WhiteHouse. #HonorThem Remarks:
American steel & American hands have constructed a 100,000 ton message to the world: American MIGHT IS SECOND TO NONE! #USSGeraldRFord #USA
To every PATRIOT who will serve on the #USSGeraldRFord: Keep the watch Protect her Defend her LOVE HER Good Luck & Godspeed!
Just arrived in Youngstown, Ohio with @FLOTUS Melania! #MakeAmericaGreatAgain
It was my great honor to join our wonderful Veterans at AMVETS Post 44 in Youngstown, Ohio this evening. A grateful nation salutes you!
People of Ohio are fantastic. Thank you so much. What an evening!
The crowd in Ohio was amazing last night - broke all records. We all had a great time in a great State. Will be back soon!
It was my great HONOR to present our nation's highest award for a public safety officer - THE MEDAL OF VALOR to FIVE AMERICAN HEROES!

data.msg: To celebrate the 4th of July, he had a good time with many veterans and servicemen, also congratulated new U.S. Navy ships.
data.image-copyright: U.S. Air Force photo/Senior Airman Jeffrey Grossi

picked.title: HillaryClinton can illegally get the questions to the Debate & delete 33,000 emails but my son Don is being scorned by the Fake News Media?

articles.title: The FAKE & FRAUDULENT NEWS MEDIA is working hard to convince Republicans and others I should not use social media - but remember, I won....
The dishonest media will NEVER keep us from accomplishing our objectives on behalf of our GREAT AMERICAN PEOPLE! #AmericaFirst
James Comey leaked CLASSIFIED INFORMATION to the media. That is so illegal!
HillaryClinton can illegally get the questions to the Debate & delete 33,000 emails but my son Don is being scorned by the Fake News Media?
With all of its phony unnamed sources & highly slanted & even fraudulent reporting, #Fake News is DISTORTING DEMOCRACY in our country!
Sean Spicer is a wonderful person who took tremendous abuse from the Fake News Media - but his future is bright!
The Failing New York Times foiled U.S. attempt to kill the single most wanted terrorist,Al-Baghdadi.Their sick agenda over National Security
So many people are asking why isn't the A.G. or Special Council looking at the many Hillary Clinton or Comey crimes. 33,000 e-mails deleted?
My son Donald openly gave his e-mails to the media & authorities whereas Crooked Hillary Clinton deleted (& acid washed) her 33,000 e-mails!
So many stories about me in the @washingtonpost are Fake News. They are as bad as ratings challenged @CNN. Lobbyist for Amazon and taxes?

data.header: Always mad at media, this time featuring "Crooked Clinton"
data.msg: While his fake news labelling continues, he openly questioned why so-called fake news doesn't report about Clinton and Comey.

picked.title: The Senate must go to a 51 vote majority instead of current 60 votes. Even parts of full Repeal need 60. 8 Dems control Senate. Crazy!

articles.title: Republicans Senators are working hard to get their failed ObamaCare replacement approved. I will be at my desk, pen in hand!
So impt Rep Senators, under leadership of @SenateMajLdr McConnell get healthcare plan approved. After 7yrs of O'Care disaster, must happen!
. @VP Mike Pence is working hard on HealthCare and getting our wonderful Republican Senators to do what is right for the people.
Republicans should just REPEAL failing ObamaCare now & work on a new Healthcare Plan that will start from a clean slate. Dems will join in!
With only a very small majority, the Republicans in the House & Senate need more victories next year since Dems totally obstruct, no votes!
The Senate must go to a 51 vote majority instead of current 60 votes. Even parts of full Repeal need 60. 8 Dems control Senate. Crazy!
I will be having lunch at the White House today with Republican Senators concerning healthcare. They MUST keep their promise to America!
The Republicans never discuss how good their healthcare bill is, & it will get even better at lunchtime.The Dems scream death as OCare dies!
ObamaCare is dead and the Democrats are obstructionists, no ideas or votes, only obstruction. It is solely up to the 52 Republican Senators!
If Republicans are going to pass great future legislation in the Senate, they must immediately go to a 51 vote majority, not senseless 60...
...Even though parts of healthcare could pass at 51, some really good things need 60. So many great future bills & budgets need 60 votes....
Republican Senate must get rid of 60 vote NOW! It is killing the R Party, allows 8 Dems to control country. 200 Bills sit in Senate. A JOKE!
The very outdated filibuster rule must go. Budget reconciliation is killing R's in Senate. Mitch M, go to 51 Votes NOW and WIN. IT'S TIME!
Republicans in the Senate will NEVER win if they don't go to a 51 vote majority NOW. They look like fools and are just wasting time......
....8 Dems totally control the U.S. Senate. Many great Republican bills will never pass, like Kate's Law and complete Healthcare. Get smart!
If the Senate Democrats ever got the chance, they would switch to a 51 majority vote in first minute. They are laughing at R's. MAKE CHANGE!
Don't give up Republican Senators, the World is watching: Repeal & Replace...and go to 51 votes (nuke option), get Cross State Lines & more.

data.msg: This might look like tweets from a politics fanatic, but it really is from Trump. He repeatedly shouted out to that Rep. Senate should get rid of 60 votes to win on health care repeal.
